message.content:
Subject: Notice of Resignation

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that I have decided to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day of work will be [Date].

I have enjoyed working with the team and contributing to the success of the company. However, I have been presented with an opportunity that I cannot pass up, and it requires me to move on to the next chapter in my career.

I would like to thank you for the support and guidance you have provided during my time here. I will do everything in my power to ensure a smooth transition and assist in finding a replacement if necessary.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to help with the process.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
